items.name: Custom consensus?
items.description:
The the "best" existing consensus solution is appropriate to OverClouds big picture?
If not, how bad it is? Would it be possible to change in the future (after the TB)? Can we make is generical?
Each user has its own identity
Generic if this solution must be adapted​ in the future
Is the amount of work correct?
Each user has its own identity keys
